examples.title: Simple Technology Query
examples.query: Looking for experts in Java and Spring Boot

examples.title: Multiple Technologies
examples.query: Find experts with experience in Java, Spring Boot, and AWS

examples.query: Need experts with microservices architecture and cloud deployment skills

examples.query: Looking for experts in financial services domain with banking experience

examples.title: Backend Technologies
examples.query: Find Java developers with Spring Boot, Hibernate, and PostgreSQL experience

examples.title: Frontend Technologies
examples.query: Looking for React and TypeScript experts with Next.js experience

examples.title: Cloud and DevOps
examples.query: Need AWS experts with Kubernetes, Docker, and CI/CD pipeline experience

examples.title: Data Technologies
examples.query: Find experts in Apache Kafka, Spark, and data streaming architectures

examples.title: Full Stack
examples.query: Need full-stack developers with Node.js, React, and MongoDB experience

examples.title: Senior Level
examples.query: Looking for senior Java developers with 10+ years of experience

examples.title: Lead/Architect Level
examples.query: Find lead architects with microservices and cloud architecture experience

examples.title: Mid-Level
examples.query: Need mid-level developers with 3-5 years of Spring Boot experience

examples.title: English Proficiency
examples.query: Find Java experts with fluent English (C1 level or higher)

examples.title: Multiple Languages
examples.query: Looking for developers with English and German language skills

examples.title: Basic Team Formation
examples.query: Need a team of 5 developers: 2 Java backend, 2 React frontend, 1 DevOps

examples.title: RFP Team
examples.query: Looking for a team to respond to RFP: 1 architect, 3 senior developers, 1 QA engineer

examples.title: Multi-Criteria Search
examples.query: Find senior Java developers with Spring Boot, AWS, and microservices experience, fluent in English, available for remote work

examples.title: Domain + Technology
examples.query: Looking for financial services experts with Java, Spring Boot, and banking domain knowledge

examples.title: RFP with Seniority and Skills
examples.query: I need experts for an RFP response. We need A3-A4 level developers with Java 21+, Spring Boot, AWS, and MongoDB experience. They should have experience with ETL pipelines, system architecture, and on-call rotation.

examples.title: RFP with Monitoring Tools
examples.query: Find me senior developers (A3-A4) who know Java 21+, Spring Boot, AWS, MongoDB, and have worked with monitoring tools like Datadog. They need to be comfortable with on-call rotations.

examples.title: RFP with Kubernetes and ETL
examples.query: Looking for experts with Java, Spring Boot, AWS, MongoDB, and Kubernetes experience for a new project. Must have ETL pipeline experience and be available for on-call support.

examples.title: RFP for Scalable Microservices
examples.query: Who can help with an RFP? We need developers with Java 21+, Spring Boot, AWS, MongoDB, and experience building scalable microservices with monitoring and observability.

examples.title: Technical Lead with Team
examples.query: I need to form a team for a new project. We need a Technical Lead (A4 or A5) with Java, Spring Boot, MongoDB, and Kafka experience. The lead should have leadership experience and be able to mentor the team.

examples.title: Technical Lead with Code Review
examples.query: Looking for a Technical Lead and team members for a Spring Boot project. The lead needs to be A4-A5 level with experience in code reviews, technical decision-making, and mentoring junior developers.

examples.title: Lead with L3 Support
examples.query: Who can lead a team working with Java, Spring Boot, MongoDB, and Kafka? We need someone with leadership experience who can handle L3 support and mentor team members.

examples.title: Lead with GraphQL and Reactive
examples.query: Find me a Technical Lead (A4-A5) and team members for a project using Java, Spring Boot, MongoDB, Kafka, and Docker. The lead should have experience with GraphQL and reactive programming.

examples.title: Semantic/Industrial Modeling
examples.query: Looking for experts in Semantic/Industrial Modeling for an urgent customer need.

examples.title: Urgent Semantic Modeling
examples.query: I need to find someone with semantic modeling experience ASAP. This is urgent for a customer proposal.

examples.title: Urgent Industrial Modeling
examples.query: Who has experience with industrial modeling? We have an urgent RFP that needs this expertise.

examples.title: Time-Sensitive Modeling Experts
examples.query: Need experts in semantic and industrial modeling immediately. This is time-sensitive for a customer opportunity.

examples.title: Java 21+ Stack for New Project
examples.query: Need experts with Java 21+, Spring Boot, AWS, and MongoDB experience for a new project.

examples.title: Java Stack Experts
examples.query: Who has experience with Java 21+, Spring Boot, AWS, and MongoDB? We're starting a new project and need skilled developers.

examples.title: Developers for Upcoming Project
examples.query: Find me developers who know Java 21+, Spring Boot, AWS, and MongoDB. We need them for an upcoming project.

examples.title: Microservices Project Team
examples.query: Looking for experts with Java 21+, Spring Boot, AWS, and MongoDB skills. This is for a new microservices project we're launching.

examples.query: Show me Siarhei Berdachuk's work experience and projects

examples.title: Siarhei Berdachuk Java Experience
examples.query: Find Siarhei Berdachuk and show his Java, Spring Boot, and AWS experience

examples.title: Experts with Similar Experience
examples.query: Find experts with similar experience to Siarhei Berdachuk - Java, Spring Boot, AWS, MongoDB, team leadership, and architecture experience

examples.title: Similar Profile to Siarhei Berdachuk
examples.query: Who has a similar profile to Siarhei Berdachuk? Looking for team leads and architects with Java, Spring Boot, microservices, and cloud experience

examples.title: Experts Like Siarhei Berdachuk
examples.query: Find experts like Siarhei Berdachuk with similar experience
